channel.title: RunePower- Development
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt]Rune Power[/size][/b][/center]
[i][center] Rune Power is a new Community Server and we are trying to make the server big. After seeingnew servers like battlescape and how good palidino has made his server, we would like to do the same. So if you would like to apply read further below. Thank You - Playermanny2 [/center][/i]
[center][b]About the Server:[/b][i] We currently havent started on the Server, but we have some things done in the client. What we are Looking for in the server are as followed
Pest Control Fight Caves Barrows Other Custom Minigames We are taking lots of ideas[/i][/center]
[center]Pictures: new Special bar- had before it was released on rune server btw ( mage owner helped) [IMG]http://i21.tinypic.com/5lscnr.jpg[/img]
Pic of test client. Venge Gfx have to play around with it a little more to get it right
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/3286/vengencegfxim5.png[/img][/URL]
More to come Soon[/center]
[center][b]JOBS:[/b][/center] [center] Director of Jobs ( make sure everyone is doing there job, controls working ) -open- -maybe 1 more-
Server Coders: -Me- -Waffles!- -iceman327- -weaving8- -Pureman- -kyledbiase-
Client Coders: -Me- -Open- -Open-
Tester: NO LIMIT ATM
Brainstormer -Jordan7- -killer90210-
Specific Coding Job: If i you would like something specific to do in client or server Post on application [/center]
[center][b]Application[/b][/center] [center][code]What Job are you applying for? Experience In the Job? Will you be active in your job? Age? Any other reason we should pick you[/code][/center]
[center][b]Forums:[/b][/center] [center][i]We Currently have a .org once i get the site approved it will be in my sig,
About: The forum is SMF, so we would like forum develepors who are farmiliar with smf and can do good work[/i][/center]
[b][center]JOBS[/center][/b] Forum Develepor:<---- [b]POSITION FULL![/b] -Heartrange- -Musicmad if he wants it- rs w00dcut-
Graphics Designer: -open- -open- [/center]
[center]We Will let you know when We Need forum and Ingame moderators/admins So Stay Active on Forums![/center] [center]Thanks In Advance To All[/center]

[quote=“0wn3d f0r 3v3r, post:63, topic:156608”]What Job are you applying for? tester
Experience In the Job? i tested the new runescape update: the clan system and: the req system. plus I tested other clients, tested client,tested dkskittlez v2.3, i tested my own server, i tested my server v3, and more…
Will you be active in your job?yes any tests that need to be done can be told over pm msn or any possible way possible.
Age?15
Any other reason we should pick you: THESE ARE OTHER FACTS, well yes I own a highly populated server, I’m a beta tester for runescape 3 belived to come out 2010, or later, and some other crap.[/quote]

accepted as tester, you can sign up at site to learn mroe information, also yodadapkzv2@hotmail.com is my email
